name: Burning Man
description:
Burning Man is a puzzle-platformer in which you keep getting set on fire. You'll need to dunk yourself in water to fix that, but the water is always somewhere inconvenient. Like behind a wooden wall. What's that? You're already on fire? Well there's a solution to that wall, now isn't there?

30 levels of puzzling, platforming challenge.

This game was originally written for a competition to make a game in 4kb in Java. Which it won, beating a certain billionaire white-supremacist game developer in the process.

It's worth about $2. But I'm setting the price to $100 instead. Better get it through the Bundle For Racial Justice And Equality instead! That'd be a better idea on multiple accounts.
